document: <sentence id="s1" text="cDNA-encoded FLAG-tagged human wildtype cellular iron ion homeostasis (li>a2) and ossification (li>a4) subunits and their mutants, li>a2P405L (causing cutis laxa), and li>a4R449H and li>a4G820R (causing renal tubular acidosis, dRTA), were transiently expressed in peptidyl-tyrosine phosphorylation 293 cells.">
